posts.post_title: FS "Exciting Moments" baseball postcard display piece c.1910
posts.post_content:
"Exciting Moments" baseball postcard display piece c.1910. (4) card set of postcards featuring baseball scenes by Edward Gross.  Postcards are on their original decorated mount with original oak frame, 8"x18".   MOVED TO EBAY:



Thank you.  Jim
